trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object represents an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, such as the heading section, footer section, or a data item.

The data items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
You can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object to programmatically access the properties of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> class.
The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items"></xref> collection of the control.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Gets or sets a data item associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.DataItem%2A> property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
Gets the index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items"></xref> collection of the control.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items"></xref> collection of the control.
Gets the type of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The following table lists the different item types.
Item Type
Description
Header
The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
Footer
The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
Item
An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
AlternatingItem
An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
SelectedItem
The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
EditItem
The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
Separator
A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
Pager
The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.

Assigns any sources of the event and its information to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control, if the <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> parameter is an instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs"></xref>.
The source of the event.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
`true` if the event assigned to the parent was raised, otherwise `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex"></xref> property.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex"></xref> property.
